mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION_ANSWER ( CUST_ID , CUST_NAME , PWD , TITLE , MEMO , USER_ID , CHRG_DATE , ANSWER , ANSWER_DATE , RGST_DATE ) VALUES ( #{custId} , #{custName} , #{pwd} , #{title} , #{memo} , null , null , null , null , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyyMMddHH24MISS') )
mapper.select: SELECT QNA.QST_SEQ , QNA.CUST_ID , ISNULL(CUS.CUST_NAME, QNA.CUST_NAME) AS CUST_NAME , QNA.TITLE , QNA.MEMO , QNA.USER_ID , USR.USER_NAME , QNA.CHRG_DATE , QNA.ANSWER , QNA.ANSWER_DATE , QNA.RGST_DATE FROM QUESTION_ANSWER QNA LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMER CUS ON CUS.CUST_ID = QNA.CUST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER USR ON QNA.USER_ID = USR.USER_ID WHERE (QNA.USER_ID IS NULL OR QNA.USER_ID = '') AND (QNA.ANSWER_DATE IS NULL OR QNA.ANSWER_DATE = '') ORDER BY QNA.QST_SEQ ASC
SELECT QST_SEQ , CUST_ID , TITLE , MEMO , USER_ID , CHRG_DATE , ANSWER , ANSWER_DATE , RGST_DATE FROM QUESTION_ANSWER WHERE QST_SEQ = #{qstSeq} AND CUST_ID = #{custId}

SELECT QNA.QST_SEQ , QNA.CUST_ID , QNA.CUST_NAME , QNA.PWD , QNA.TITLE , QNA.MEMO , QNA.USER_ID , USR.USER_NAME , QNA.CHRG_DATE , QNA.ANSWER , QNA.ANSWER_DATE , QNA.RGST_DATE , CASE WHEN ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') = '' THEN '00' WHEN ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') <> '' AND ISNULL(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, '') = '' THEN '01' ELSE '02' END AS STATE_CD , CASE WHEN ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') = '' THEN '배정대기' WHEN ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') <> '' AND ISNULL(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, '') = '' THEN '답변대기' ELSE '답변완료' END AS STATE_NAME FROM QUESTION_ANSWER QNA LEFT OUTER JOIN USER USR ON QNA.USER_ID = USR.USER_ID
AND QNA.CUST_ID = #{custId}
AND QNA.CUST_NAME LIKE #{custName} || '%'
AND ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') = ''
AND ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') <> '' AND ISNULL(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, '') = ''
AND (ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') <> '' AND ISNULL(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, '') <> '')
ORDER BY QNA.QST_SEQ DESC
